fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value: - If the owner stops here, they may add 10 stocks to the Brick Store for 150$.

fields.name: Drive-by Effects:
fields.value: - You may purchase a Brick for 50$. If you do, the Brick Store loses 1 stock, and you gain a Brick (Chest Card 70).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This card begins with 10 stock of Bricks.
- After this property is owned, each time a Brick is purchased, the owner gains 20$.
